title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: 'Tis the season to be jolly! Betplay.io invites you to take part in Pragmatic Play's Countdown to Christmas tournament. For this seven-day network event, there will be a total prize pool of 14,000 USD awarded to the victors. The competition will take place from December 13 through December 20, 2022.You will indeed Feel the magic of Christmas!Tournament Schedule:13th of December 2022 at 12:00 GMT+8 to 20th of December 2022 11:59 GMT+8The minimum bet amount per game round is USD 0.20. The exciting tourney can also be played in currencies such as THB, INR, ARS, BRL, AZN, CAD, CHF, KZT, MXN, NOK, NZD, GBP, HKD, CNY, JPY, and more!For a chance to be listed among the winners, you can play any of the Pragmatic Play Casino participating games, including 5 Lions Megaways, Bigger Bass Bonanza, Chillin Heat, Wild Wild Riches, Wild Gold, 5 Lion Gold, Big Bass Splash, Sweet Bonanza, Buffalo King Megaways, Christmas Big Bass Bonanza, Wild Wild Riches, Madame Destiny Megaways, Sweet Bonanza Xmas, Great Rhino Megaways, The Dog House, Floating Dragon Hold & Spin, Great Rhino Megaways, Fruit Party, Gates of Olympus, John Hunter and the Book of Tut Respin, Mustang Gold.The likelihood of ranking higher rises as you accrue more victories. A cash prize will be awarded to the top 30 participants each day.You're going to get some thrilling holiday treats! Join this season's spectacular event now. If you have any questions about the campaign, contact us via our live chat support. https://betplay.io/en/news/pragmatic-play's-countdown-to-christmas-tournament
